import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import classes from './Messenger.module.css'; const Messenger = () => { //State ẩn hiện bóng bóng chat const [popup, setPopup] = useState(false); return ( <>
setPopup(!popup)} >
{popup && (
